articles.title: Aaron Carter accidentally drowned after taking drugs - BBC
articles.description: The US rapper was found dead in a bathtub at his Californian home in November aged 34.
articles.content:
US popstar Aaron Carter accidentally drowned in his bathtub because of drugs he had taken, a coroner's report says.
Carter, 34, the younger brother of the Backstreet Boys' Nick Carter, was found dea… [+2367 chars]
